greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array T(M,N) read by antidiagonals: number of dimer tilings of a 2M x 2N Klein bottle.
link: Cliff, Danny and Zoe Stoll, About Klein bottles
W. T. Lu and F. Y. Fu, Dimer statistics on the Moebius strip and the Klein bottle, arXiv:cond-mat/9906154 [cond-mat.stat-mech], 1999.
mathematica: Table[T[m-n, n], {m, 0, 9}, {n, 0, m}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Aug 20 2018 *)
program: {T(n, k) = round(prod(a=1, n, prod(b=1, k, 4*sin((4*a-1)*Pi/(4*n))^2+4*sin((2*b-1)*Pi/(2*k))^2)))} \\ _Seiichi Manyama_, Jan 11 2021
xref: Rows include A003499, A067902+2. Columns include A003500+2.
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, Feb 26 2005
